DataElement.preferredName: PedsQL Cancer Module Version 3 C2 Past One Month How Much Difficulty Asking Doctors or Nurses Questions Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how much of a problem it has been in the past one month with asking the doctors or nurses questions, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory Cancer Module Past 30 Days Quantity Difficulty Asking Doctors or Nurses Questions Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A complement to the Pediatric Quality of Life generic core scales designed to provide greater measurement sensitivity for patients with cancer. This module has 25 items comprising 8 dimensions for use with children aged 2 to 18 years._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._A question about whether an individual has difficulty asking the doctors or nurses questions._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory Score 5 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened almost all of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened almost all of the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer that something occurs frequently.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer that something occurs frequently.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added "Sometimes" to represent the MSAS value domain.ghd.01.27.15

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer that something rarely happens.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer that something rarely happens.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

ReferenceDocuments.name: It is hard for me to ask the
ReferenceDocuments.description: It is hard for me to ask the doctors and nurses questions

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Scoring Manual Link
ReferenceDocuments.description: The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure.
